description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Krabi, Thailand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Thailand Five-Star Krabi Beachfront Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Find your slice of beachfront paradise at this five-star resort on the pristine shores of Tubkaek Beach in Krabi, Thailand's southwestern coastal paradise. Soak up the spectacular limestone cliffs and bright blue waters that Krabi is famous for, and unwind in style at this waterfront retreat - tucked away from the hustle and bustle of Phuket and Khao Lak. Saour a decadent treatment at Chaonang Spa, cool off in one of the three sparkling swimming pools with pristine ocean views or sample mouth-watering Thai cuisine at Lotus Restaurant. Within easy reach of Krabi Town, the popular Ao Nang Beach and other renowned attractions, this beachfront oasis is the perfect launchpad to discover this enchanting part of Thailand.

hotels.title: Krabi Five-Star Beachfront Private Pool Suites with World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Gaze across sapphire-blue waters and lush green mountains while absorbing the soothing jungle atmosphere at the five-star Banyan Tree Krabi - a luxurious haven perched on Tubkaek Beach. Begin your day by plunging into your private pool before sampling delicious cuisine at The Naga Kitchen or Saffron. Set yourself up along the lounger-lined pool overlooking the beach, hit the sleek fitness centre or visit the expansive spa. There’s also a Kids' Club with a mini waterpark to entertain little ones, plus snorkelling gear and paddleboards for guests to explore secluded coves nearby. Then, round out your day at Kredkaew Bar or Bird’s Nest for front-row sunset views.

hotels.title: Five Star Krabi Eco-Stay with Panoramic Mountain Views
hotels.description: Find the epitome of relaxation among southern Thailand's striking limestone cliffs and peaceful forested valleys on a luxurious escape to Anana Ecological Resort Krabi, a five-star eco-retreat offering an incomparable wellness experience. Just a 30-minute stroll from Ao Nang's breathtaking stretch of beach, this sustainable oasis invites you to get back to nature and embrace green living through enriching amenities that focus on health and wellbeing. Restore mind, body and soul with an exclusive spa treatment in the Himalaya Salt Crystal Grotto and a soothing dip in the natural volcanic water pools, or indulge in delicious food from the Permaculture Organic Art Farm. From rooftop yoga to outdoor meditation, embrace opportunities to reconnect with nature through mindful activities.

hotels.vendor_name: Sofitel Phokeethra Krabi Golf & Spa Resort
hotels.title: Krabi Beachfront Haven with Six Restaurants & Bars, Outdoor Pool & Golf Course
hotels.description: Experience the height of Thai luxury at this five-star beachfront retreat, set along the tranquil shores of Klong Muang Beach in Krabi. With Sofitel's renowned service and world-class amenities, unwind in style by Thailand’s largest lagoon-style pool, enjoy soothing treatments at So SPA or stretch out on the golden shores just steps away. The resort offers six diverse dining options, ranging from traditional Thai dishes to wood-fired pizzas and Indian specialties. Tee off at the onsite nine-hole golf course, take a scenic boat trip to iconic nearby islands such as Phi Phi and James Bond Island, or relax with a refreshing cocktail from the pool bar - be spoilt for choice at this tropical oasis.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach
hotels.title: Lush Tropical Thailand Holiday with Idyllic Mountain & Beach Views
hotels.description: Retreat within the trees at the Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach, an IHG Hotel, found between the lush green hillside and the sparkling Ao Nang Beach. An idyllic space for families and groups to chill out and rejuvenate, this resort is inspired by the stunning Krabi culture and surrounding landscape. Enjoy days by the breathtaking beach, explore the nearby islands or stay at the hotel and indulge in the premium onsite dining experiences.

hotels.title: Five-Star Krabi Beachfront Paradise
hotels.description: Exclusivity reigns supreme at the five-star Rayavadee, a boutique hotel framed by sheer limestone cliffs and bordered by three of Krabi's most beautiful white-sand beaches. An idyllic Thai village-style resort of private pavilions and dramatic views over the glistening Phra Nang Peninsula, Rayavadee has well and truly earned its reputation for all-out tropical indulgence. Perfectly located on the border of Krabi National Marine Park, Rayavadee is an oasis where you can dine in an ancient limestone cave with views of the crystal-clear Andaman Sea at The Grotto, watch the sunset from the ocean-view infinity pool, and find tranquillity at the onsite Rayavadee Spa. Home to four gorgeous restaurants and Eden-worthy tropical gardens, this is a true five-star Thai paradise.

hotels.vendor_name: Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort
hotels.title: Chic Cliffside Krabi Hideaway with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Experience the breathtaking cliffside bliss of Krabi at the serene Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort, a picturesque slice of paradise perched in a stunning clifftop location overlooking the shimmering Andaman Sea. Immerse yourself in tropical tranquillity at AvaniSpa, indulge in a variety of cuisines at the many onsite restaurants or sink your toes into the white sands of the nearby beach. Drink in sparkling sea views from the rooftop bar and explore the nearby Ao Nang.
